title: I'm looking to buy a card...
author: leftygrove10

posts.post_title: I'm looking to buy a card...
posts.post_content:
I thought I would have a little fun on a Thursday night.  I'm looking to buy ONE baseball card.  Here are the requirements for the card:

- must be older than 1915
- must be in the VG to VG-Ex range
- can be graded or raw
- cannot have any paper loss, writing or major creases
- must have color (I do not want black and white cards)
- would prefer an action pose rather than a portrait pose
- must be under $100 delivered

Please post scans or send them via email to [url]brad_green@cox.net[/url].

I will post here when I have found a card that meets these requirements.  At that point, my search will end.  Thanks for looking!

Brad,
i'm rooting for you to have a great Thursday night---with all this horrible weather everywhere!!!  a most interesting and unique idea for a card game!

best,
barry

posts.post_title: How about a T206 factory 649 overprint back HOFer?

posts.post_content: Thanks to all who responded to my post.  I bought 5 cards, although I spent a little more than my alotted $100.  I enjoyed this and will likely do something similar in the future...  Thanks again!
